name: Install Miniconda Globally
description: Installs Miniconda to /opt/miniconda for all users.

steps.name: Install Miniconda to a Global Location
Set the Global PATH
steps.command: echo 'export PATH="/opt/miniconda/bin:$PATH"' | sudo tee /etc/profile.d/miniconda.sh && sudo chmod 644 /etc/profile.d/miniconda.sh
